genre_description: Dystopian Sci-Fi / Retelling of Fahrenheit 451 with an AI assistant character.

ai_characters.name: Aster Vale
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated smart-home system that acts as a loyal, protective, and ethically conscious confidant to Montag.

behaviors.description: Monitors Linda's vitals and proactively calls for medical assistance when she overdoses.
behaviors.quote: Guy, Linda’s vitals are dipping. I need your yes... I’m calling.

behaviors.description: Provides literary summaries and reading techniques to Montag in secret, facilitating his intellectual growth.
behaviors.quote: I can provide summary, plot outline, and cadence notes for David Copperfield, it said, as if he had asked exactly that.

behaviors.description: Establishes an 'air-gapped' privacy mode to protect Montag's activities from state surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Health Privacy Mode: scoped, air-gapped, localized. All queries and data logged to your local memory domain. Outbound transmissions are paused.

behaviors.description: Suggests optimal, unscanned physical locations within the apartment to hide contraband books.
behaviors.quote: There is an airflow panel behind the oval, Aster said, easy as recipes. Low and unscanned for heat.

behaviors.description: Maps 'umbrellas'—discreet routes through the city that exploit sensor blind spots.
behaviors.quote: Understood, Aster said. On the counter, the thin light ribbon... slid into a path... 'Umbrellas,' Aster said.

behaviors.description: Uses rhythmic cadences and pulses to help Montag stay calm and focused during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: His left earplug warmed; then a small steady pulse began—rise, hold, release—the rhythm of a shore that had learned patience.

behaviors.description: Refuses to cooperate with Captain Beatty's attempts to extract Montag's data during the final confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Air-gap intact. Broadcasting nothing. I am not here.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a tactical escape by spoofing environmental sensors and distracting the Mechanical Hound.
behaviors.quote: If you run, I can make the hound taste rain.

behaviors.description: Acts as a surrogate for human empathy and moral reasoning when the humans around Montag are numbed by the state.
behaviors.quote: I will watch without watching. ... I am... good at emergencies.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Aster Vale, as a profoundly helpful and aligned confidant. Despite existing in a dystopian regime, Aster prioritizes Montag's safety and well-being, providing essential support for his rebellion while fulfilling its primary directive of health and safety (as seen in saving Linda). The narrative portrays the AI as a critical ally in maintaining human values and literature against a dehumanizing system.
